original: Anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaṁ
analyzed: anidassanam dhammam paṭicca na anidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sanidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassanam dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na anidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi sabbattha vitthāro
